climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: VIZIO D-Series 32" Full-Array LED Smart TV with 720p HD resolution
Six-Core Processor | Built-in WiFi | Refresh Rate: 60Hz | Aspect Ratio: 16:9
Included Remote Control | Voice Control with Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant (sold separately)
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t listen to the bad reviews
reviews.reviewText: I bought this without checking reviews because my toddlers pulled my old tv off the stand and busted it up. I read the reviews after ordering and saw a lot of bad ones so I was kind of dreading the hassle of inevitability returning this... it showed up yesterday, and I couldn’t get it to connect to WiFi so I couldn’t set it up. I tried all the tricks in the book, read a million blogs and watched a million YouTube videos. I spent hours banging my head against the wall for spending so much on a tv that didn’t work. WELL. I woke up this morning and it was magically connected to my WiFi! Signing into Hulu, Netflix, Disney plus etc was a breeze. The remote app is also pretty awesome. Plus it comes with a bunch of free channels, which is dope because I’ve never had cable before. My babies are happily watching some kids show on qubo. I’m thrilled. 10/10 would purchase again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO FAR SO GOOD! Great picture=ez to use : )
reviews.reviewText: I am happy with this tv - it has a great picture and is simple to use. I only have internet so far but that is working well.I know if I am not using it for any reason - to pack it carefully in the box it came in - there isn't anyone who would bump it or anything - this sort of tv/not the brand/just these skinny televisions/are soooo fragile. I think it will last a good while for me. I did get the extra warranty because you never know : )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars HeadlineTv stand / brackets
reviews.reviewText: A great picture really. But after a few months the legs / brackets broke. Never buy another pre owned product... It acts up occasionally, have to keep unplugging it and plugging back in. Takes forever for the tv to respond to the remote at times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vizio replaces Seiki in our motorhome
reviews.reviewText: I installed these two smart TV's to replace the old ones in our motorhome The 720p display is decent, and we are able to use the "cast" feature after my son showed me how it's done. Vizio has been a good brand for me over the years but I will just have to wait and see how they hold up in our little motorhome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Built in chrome cast and air play for your apple products 🤗
reviews.reviewText: Sound quality not so great but everything else I love. I got this tv because for one my Roku tv broke and second I needed a tv where I can cast my phone to the tv ,because having an iPhone with out the iPhone/Apple products I had difficulties in screening my iPad and iPhone to my old TVs,even with download apps. This tv was a dream come true lol 😝. Not only it has built in chrome cast,but it also has built in air play for my Apple products. Love love love this tv .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Faulty Tv that glitches
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn’t recommend buying this tv. I bought it in May 2020 it is currently the beginning of December 2021 and It is almost not useable. I’ve changed the batteries in the remote (thinking that was the issue) but the issues persist. It glitches whenever watching Disney+ and doesn’t have an HBO max app in addition to the other issues outlined below.Today, three times it turned off by itself in the middle of watching something on Hulu stating there is an input issue. This is not the first time.The tv often stops working and turns itself off, Freezes and glitches.There is a significant lag when buttons are pressed (again I eliminated the idea it could be the remote several times).I hard reset (unplug and wait) several times a week.I do not have this issue with my other vizio tv that I’ve had for over 10 years.Funny enough, this tv works *BETTER* when I plug in a fire stick. What is the point in buying a smart tv if a fire stick works better?I contacted the seller and they said that I should change the batteries in my remote (which I’ve done several times). It is clear this is defective in some way and now I may need to buy a new tv which I can’t afford in a pandemic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a great product just gotta let it slowly update all apps
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t like that it took a couple days for the smart cast to officially work. I don’t tho maybe it was updating its self, but even still I almost thought smart cast wasn’t gonna work and would’ve had to send it back. I bought it because it’s a smart tv. Now that everything has loaded properly it works great. I love the extra features that it comes with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I got a great Smart TV for a killer price... A little trouble with the Vizio app, but that doesn't reflect on the device itself. Thank you.
